tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Overall, not a bad class. Class is based primarily on what he says in class. Quizzes and exams are challenging. Exam questions are pretty tricky. Lots of little assignments that are worth 1% which can be annoying. The best way to do well in the class is to take good notes and ask questions.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Dr Cutruffelo is the best! He really goes out of his way to help us even though we dont take his class. I wish I had taken him than profesor Brelof.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: He had no idea what he was talking about. He wants to look good and he thinks he knows it all but he doesn\'t! He definitely favors some of the students. Unfortunately, I have to take him again.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Difficult to understand sometimes, make sure you are clear on assignments. He can sometimes favor athletes so beware and always study for pop quizzes he can pop them in anywhere.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Can be nice one day and a jerk the next. He can also be offensive and rude. If you take his class you\'ll pass but your grade depends on how much he likes you.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Super nice guy. He is always willing to help and he does his best to help students and wants everyone to pass. just make sure to take notes and understand the material and you should be fine.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Great teacher! Test questions are difficult but you really learn a lot. He brings a lot of energy to class.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Paul is a really nice guy. He tries his best to reach his students & help them in any way he can, so he gets frustrated when kids don\'t seem to care about the class. Tests are not bad as long as you study.. nothing tricky just straight up muscles, origins, insertions, etc. Would definitely recommend him to anyone.
